meanings.definition: The quality or state of being a dude.
meanings.sent1: His dudenesses shone through when he fixed the car with ease.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends exuded dudenesses as they skateboarded down the street.
meanings.sent3: The dudenesses of his outfit made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her dudenesses was like a shining beacon of coolness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The dudenesses of the cowboy was unmatched in the wild west.

meanings.definition: The characteristics or traits associated with being a dude.
meanings.sent1: The movie perfectly captured the dudenesses of the main character.
meanings.sent2: His style and attitude screamed dudenesses wherever he went.
meanings.sent3: The dudenesses of his jokes always brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The dudenesses of the old car reminded him of simpler times.
meanings.sent5: She admired the dudenesses of his confidence and charm.
